edge: Costello is portrayed by Jack Nicholson and DiCaprio plays the role of Billy Costigan Jr., who is an undercover cop assigned to infiltrate Costello's gang.
DiCaprio and Damon share a complicated relationship as Billy and Sullivan, both working undercover for different agencies.
Sullivan is played by Damon, who starts out as a loyal member of the police department but later realizes he's been infiltrated by Costello's gang.
Wahlberg portrays Dignam, a tough and experienced cop working alongside DiCaprio and Damon's characters.
Sheen plays Queenan, a high-ranking police official who oversees Sullivan and Dignam's investigation.
Winstone portrays Frenchie, a low-level criminal working for Costello's organization.
Farmiga plays the role of Madden, a psychiatrist hired by Costello to help Sullivan overcome his inner demons.
Baldwin portrays Ellerby, a high-ranking police official who is skeptical of Sullivan's methods and investigative tactics.
Anderson plays the role of Trooper Brown, a fellow cop working alongside Dignam and Sullivan's investigation.
Corrigan plays the role of Sean Costigan, Billy's younger brother who is also involved in his father's criminal enterprise.
Dale portrays the character of Trooper Barrigan, a young and eager cop working under Queenan's supervision.
O'Hara plays the role of Fitzy, a veteran criminal working for Costello's organization.
Wahlberg portrays the character of Lazio, a seasoned FBI agent working in tandem with DiCaprio and Damon's characters.
Lynch plays the role of Carmen, a woman associated with Costello's organization.
Dalton portrays Gwen, a figure involved in Costello's criminal activities.
Duffin plays the role of Phil, a minor character associated with Costello's organization.
